name: Blood glucose testing lancets not included in NHS England commissioning recommendations
title: Blood glucose testing lancets not included in NHS England commissioning recommendations
description: Percentage of prescriptions for blood glucose testing lancets not included in NHS England commissioning recommendations
numerator_short: Prescriptions for lancets not included in guidance
y_label: Percentage of blood glucose test lancet items not in line with NHS England recommendations
why_it_matters: Many people with diabetes test their blood glucose levels, using a blood glucose meter, in order to help control their diabetes by adjusting diet and the dose of medicines.
Users use a “lancet” in order to prick their finger to draw a drop of blood for use with the meter. These lancets fit specific lancing devices, and are only used once.
updated commissioning guidelines, recommending specific meters, test strips and lancets.
NHS England National Medicines Optimisation Opportunities for 2024/25 identify promoting uptake of best value testing strips as an area for improvement.
As NHS England publish periodic updates to their commissioning recommendations, this measure is designed to track the recommendations during the time period each guideline is valid.
Please note: OpenPrescribing.net measures also have a consistent way of visualising measures, where 'lower is better', and therefore in this case we show the proportion of lancets
which are NOT in the NHS commissioning recommendations.
numerator_where:
LOWER(bnf_name) LIKE '%lancets%'
AND 
 -- versions 1, 2, 3 published 2023-04-11, 2023-10-12, 2024-11-18, unchanged
 bnf_code NOT IN (
 '21010900637', -- Glucoject lancets PLUS 0.2mm/33gauge (A. Menarini Diagnostics Ltd) CURRENT
 '21012600193', -- AgaMatrix Comfort Twist lancets 0.32mm/30gauge (AgaMatrix Europe Ltd) CURRENT
 '21010900736', -- AgaMatrix Ultra-Thin lancets 0.2mm/33gauge (AgaMatrix Europe Ltd) CURRENT
 '21010900735', -- AgaMatrix Ultra-Thin lancets 0.35mm/28gauge (AgaMatrix Europe Ltd) CURRENT

 '21010900855', -- GlucoRx Safety lancets 1.8mm/26gauge (GlucoRx Ltd) CURRENT

 '21010900728', -- Greenlan lancets 0.35mm/28gauge (Neon Diagnostics Ltd) CURRENT
 '21010900945', -- 4SURE lancets sterile single use 0.32mm/30gauge (Nipro Diagnostics (UK) Ltd) CURRENT
 '21010900946', -- 4SURE lancets sterile single use 0.195mm/33gauge (Nipro Diagnostics (UK) Ltd) CURRENT

'21010900768', -- Apollo twist lancets 0.36mm/28gauge (Apollo Medical Technologies Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4
'21012600182', -- Apollo twist lancets 0.3mm/30gauge (Apollo Medical Technologies Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4
'21012600145', -- Klinion Soft Fine Colour lancets 0.36mm/28gauge (Mediq Healthcare UK Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4
'21012600144', -- Klinion Soft Fine Colour lancets 0.31mm/30gauge (Mediq Healthcare UK Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4
'21010900955', -- Kinetik Wellbeing lancets 0.28mm/30 gauge (Kinetik Medical Devices Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4
'21012600207', -- Glucoject lancets Extra 0.2mm/33gauge (A. Menarini Diagnostics Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4
'21012600203', -- Apollo BV safety lancets 1.8mm/26gauge (Apollo Medical Technologies Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4

'21010900934', -- Neon Verifine Safety lancets 1.8mm/23gauge (Neon Diagnostics Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4

'21010900761', -- Apollo pressure-activated safety lancets 1.8mm/26gauge (Apollo Medical Technologies Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4
'21010900762', -- Apollo pressure-activated safety lancets 1.8mm/28gauge (Apollo Medical Technologies Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4
'21010900957', -- Microdot HiFlow lancets 2.2mm/21gauge (Cambridge Sensors Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4

'21010900838', -- Microdot Professional lancets 2.2mm/23gauge (Cambridge Sensors Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4
'21012600210', -- Apollo Tri-Plus safety lancets 1.3mm/1.8mm/2.3mm/23gauge (Apollo Medical Technologies Ltd) ADDED VERSION 4

'21010900890' -- Mylife Safety Comfort lancets 0.32mm/30gauge (Pikdare S.p.A.) ADDED VERSION 4
AND 
(DATE(month) >= '2025-07-01' 
OR bnf_code NOT IN (
'21010900729' -- GlucoZen lancets 0.36mm/28gauge (GlucoZen Ltd) REMOVED VERSION 4
 -- version 5 published 2025-09-19
 -- No changes from version 4

Created measure.
